heading.name: Advanced Care Planning Prevalence
heading.definition: % of active patients in the practice coded with Advanced Care Planning.
heading.notes: i) Advanced care patients: "Patient Status: Active AND has a Current Problem List/Profile item code of 105499002 or starting with V66" ii) Other patients: "Patient Status: Active AND does not have a Current Problem List/Profile item code of 105499002 or starting with V66"

indicatorQuery.query: SELECT -- PERCENT OF TOTAL PATIENTS NOTED AS ACTIVE WITH CURRENT ADVANCED CARE PLANNING IF( COUNT(fin.patient) > 0, SUM( IF( dxresearch_code is not NULL , 1, 0) ) , 0 ) AS "% Active, Current Advanced Care Planning", -- PERCENT OF TOTAL PATIENTS NOTED AS ACTIVE WITHOUT CURRENT ADVANCED CARE PLANNING IF( COUNT(fin.patient) > 0, SUM( IF( dxresearch_code is NULL , 1, 0) ) , 0 ) AS "% Active, No Current Advanced Care Planning" FROM ( SELECT d.demographic_no AS patient, d.patient_status AS pt_status, dxresearch_code FROM demographic d LEFT JOIN ( SELECT demographic_no, dxresearch_code, count(dxresearch_code) FROM dxresearch WHERE status='A' AND ( (LEFT(dxresearch_code, 3) IN ('V66') AND coding_system = ${dxcodesSysICD}) OR (dxresearch_code IN ('105499002') AND coding_system LIKE ${dxcodesSysSnoMed}) ) GROUP BY demographic_no ORDER BY demographic_no ) problems ON d.demographic_no = problems.demographic_no WHERE d.provider_no LIKE ${provider} AND d.patient_status = ${pstatus} ) fin

drillDownQuery.query: SELECT * FROM demographic d LEFT JOIN dxresearch dxr ON d.demographic_no = dxr.demographic_no WHERE d.patient_status=${pstatus} AND ( (LEFT(dxr.dxresearch_code, 3) IN ('V66') AND dxr.coding_system = ${dxcodesSysICD}) OR (dxr.dxresearch_code IN ('105499002') AND dxr.coding_system LIKE ${dxcodesSysSnoMed}) ) AND dxr.status = 'A' AND d.provider_no LIKE ${provider} GROUP BY d.demographic_no ORDER BY COUNT(d.demographic_no) DESC, d.demographic_no
